0001_hello-world.title: #1 - Hello World - Welcome to My Interactive Blog!
0001_hello-world.excerpt: Welcome to my personal blog! This is my first interactive post where I share my thoughts and introduce myself with interactive components.

0002_getting-started-with-nextjs.title: #2 - Getting Started with Next.js 14 - Interactive Guide
0002_getting-started-with-nextjs.excerpt: A comprehensive interactive guide to building modern web applications with Next.js 14, featuring hands-on examples and interactive components.

0003_interactive-components-showcase.title: #3 - Interactive Components Showcase - The Power of MDX
0003_interactive-components-showcase.excerpt: Explore the full potential of interactive blog content with this showcase of all available interactive components.

0004_syntax-highlighting-demo.title: #4 - Beautiful Code Syntax Highlighting with Shiki
0004_syntax-highlighting-demo.excerpt: Experience VS Code-quality syntax highlighting in your blog with Shiki. Learn how to display beautiful code examples across multiple programming languages.

0005_typescript-series-01_introduction.title: #5 - TypeScript Fundamentals: Part 1 - Introduction
0005_typescript-series-01_introduction.excerpt: Begin your TypeScript journey with this comprehensive introduction. Learn about basic types, functions, interfaces, and why TypeScript is essential for modern development.

0006_typescript-series-02_advanced-types.title: #6 - TypeScript Fundamentals: Part 2 - Advanced Types
0006_typescript-series-02_advanced-types.excerpt: Level up your TypeScript skills with generics, utility types, type guards, and advanced type manipulation. Master the features that make TypeScript powerful.

0007_typescript-series-03_real-world-pat.title: #7 - TypeScript Fundamentals: Part 3 - Real-World Patterns
0007_typescript-series-03_real-world-pat.excerpt: Complete your TypeScript mastery with real-world patterns, React integration, testing strategies, and professional best practices.

0008_mermaid-diagrams-demo.title: #8 - Mermaid Diagrams Demo - Visual Documentation Made Easy
0008_mermaid-diagrams-demo.excerpt: Explore the power of Mermaid diagrams in your blog posts. Create flowcharts, sequence diagrams, Gantt charts, and more with simple text syntax.

0009_kroki-diagrams-demo.title: #9 - Kroki Diagrams Demo - 20+ Diagram Types in One Integration
0009_kroki-diagrams-demo.excerpt: Discover the power of Kroki integration supporting PlantUML, Ditaa, BPMN, GraphViz, and 15+ other diagram types. Create professional diagrams with unified API.

0010_gfm-demo.title: #10 - GitHub Flavored Markdown Demo - Tables, Strikethrough & More
0010_gfm-demo.excerpt: Demonstrating GitHub Flavored Markdown features including tables, strikethrough, task lists, and more.

0011_alert-demo.title: #11 - Alert Components Demo - O'Reilly Style
0011_alert-demo.excerpt: Demonstrating O'Reilly-style alert components including info, warning, error, success, tip, and note alerts for enhanced content presentation.

0012_figure-component-demo.title: #12 - Figure Component Demo - Cloudinary Integration & Lightbox
0012_figure-component-demo.excerpt: Showcasing the new Figure component with automatic Cloudinary URL handling, lightbox functionality, and enhanced image display capabilities.

0013_quiz-system-demo.title: #13 - Interactive Quiz System Demo - Encrypted Answers, Animations, & MDX Support
0013_quiz-system-demo.excerpt: A comprehensive demonstration of the new interactive quiz system with encryption, animations, and MDX support.

0014_quiz-creation-guide.title: #14 - Quiz Creation Guide - Multiple Approaches
0014_quiz-creation-guide.excerpt: Learn different ways to create quizzes in your MDX content with dedicated components, reusable components, and advanced builders.

0015_xin-chao-viet.title: #15 - Xin chào! Bài viết đầu tiên bằng tiếng Việt
0015_xin-chao-viet.excerpt: Bài viết tiếng Việt đầu tiên: tối giản, giàu tính biên tập, có ví dụ và tương tác.

0016_book-layout-article.title: #16 - Book-Style Article Layout — Reading as Craft
0016_book-layout-article.excerpt: A calm, Swiss-influenced, book-like layout for long-form reading with thoughtful rhythm.

0017_mathjax-demo.title: #17 - MathJax Demo — Typeset TeX in MDX
0017_mathjax-demo.excerpt: Examples of inline and block math rendered with MathJax components in MDX.

0018_katex-demo.title: #18 - KaTeX Demo — Fast TeX Rendering
0018_katex-demo.excerpt: Inline and block math via KaTeX ($ and $$) using rehype-katex.

0019_danh-cho-nhung-nguoi-khac-la.title: #19 - Dành cho những người khác lạ
0019_danh-cho-nhung-nguoi-khac-la.excerpt: Có những người, dù cố gắng thế nào, vẫn không thể làm yên trong khuôn của người khác. Một suy nghĩ về tự do, khác biệt, và sống đúng với chính mình.
